summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Board of Adjustment (Panel B) will convene on January 22, 2025, for a briefing at 10:30 A.M., followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, Room 6ES, and will also be accessible via videoconference. The primary purpose is to discuss various zoning cases and adjustments requested by residents.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The meeting will include a staff presentation, public testimony, and a review of the case docket, which consists of uncontested items, holdover items, and individual cases. 

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include several applications for variances and special exceptions related to fence height regulations, side-yard setbacks, and single-family use regulations. Notable cases include requests from Margot Murphy for fence height exceptions at 6930 Alpha Road, and applications from Spencer Estep and Blanca Cardenas for side-yard setback variances at 6041 McCommas Boulevard and 3146 Clydedale Drive, respectively.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking approval of the minutes from the previous meeting on December 18, 2024, as well as decisions on the various zoning requests presented. Interested parties must register to speak by January 21, 2025, to participate in the public hearing.
